attributes.action: EEA Citizens MUST Train and Pay for The SIA Badge as UK Citizens Do
attributes.additional_details:
If you are a UK national and want to work in the Security Industry you must,
Attend and pass training course approx cost £200, pay the SIA £220 to apply for a licence to practice.
If you are an EU national, to work in the security industry you must
Register with the SIA at no charge and if there is no training etc scheme in your home country, just provide evidence of working in sector for 2 out of the previous 10 years.
This is all free so you can work in the UK.

We believe all people working within the Security Industry must meet the same criteria, have the accredited training and pay the SIA licence fee.
